**Study:** Allen, M., Bhanji, A., Willemsen, J., Dudfield, S., Logan, S., & Monks, T. A simulation modelling toolkit for organising outpatient dialysis services during the COVID-19 pandemic. *PLoS One* 15, 8 (2020). <https://doi.org/10.1371%2Fjournal.pone.0237628>.
